segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, oblivious, drying her dishes like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's splashing all over the cabinets and floorâ€” what a mess!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the puddle already; she's gonna slip and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids over there, climbing on that rickety stool for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretching way up, and the stool's tilting back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting with her hand out, like this is all fun and games.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn't be doing that without asking; it's so irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticing the water or the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet before it floods the whole kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets are getting ruined by the water streaming down.
segments.speaker: PAR
